exploration.name: Special Caves
exploration.description: Draft one cave after starting hands are dealt.

exploration.name: New and Rare Cards
exploration.description: Mix in extra cards and trim one more per added card.

exploration.name: Solo / Automa
exploration.description: Solo-only removal totals and Automa setup.

common.text: Place the Clearing board in the center and set the 14 reference cards beside it.
Give each player one Cave card to keep in front of them.
Remove the three Winter cards from the deck and keep them aside.
Combine the base deck with any selected expansion cards.
Split the remaining cards into three face-down piles of similar size.
Shuffle two Winter cards into one pile, then place the third Winter card on top of that pile.
Stack the other two piles on top of the Winter pile to form the draw deck near the Clearing.
Each player draws 6 cards as their starting hand.

conditionalSteps.text: Exploration (New and Rare module): if you use it, shuffle the chosen New and Rare cards into the deck before trimming. Remove one extra card for each New and Rare card added. Optional variant: deal two random New and Rare cards to each player and start with 8 cards instead of 6.
Base game: after setting aside Winter cards, shuffle the rest and remove 30 unseen for 2 players.
Base game: after setting aside Winter cards, shuffle the rest and remove 20 unseen for 3 players.
Base game: after setting aside Winter cards, shuffle the rest and remove 10 unseen for 4 players.
Base game: after setting aside Winter cards, shuffle the rest and remove none for 5 players.
Alpine only: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 45 more for 2 players (total 55).
Alpine only: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 30 more for 3 players (total 40).
Alpine only: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 15 more for 4 players (total 25).
Alpine only: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove none for 5 players (total 10).
Woodland Edge only: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 45 more for 2 players (total 55).
Woodland Edge only: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 30 more for 3 players (total 40).
Woodland Edge only: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 15 more for 4 players (total 25).
Woodland Edge only: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove none for 5 players (total 10).
Alpine + Woodland Edge: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 80 more for 2 players (total 90).
Alpine + Woodland Edge: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 50 more for 3 players (total 60).
Alpine + Woodland Edge: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 35 more for 4 players (total 45).
Alpine + Woodland Edge: shuffle the deck, return 10 unseen, then remove 20 more for 5 players (total 30).

Exploration solo mode: use the 2-player removal totals (base 30, base + Alpine 55, base + Alpine + Woodland Edge 90). Use only one Winter card, shuffled into the last 10 cards, then set up the Automa deck and clearing.
Exploration (Special Caves module): after dealing starting hands, place five Special Cave cards in the center. In reverse turn order, each player chooses one, then return the rest to the box.
